Source.Name: libdazzle
Source.Summary: The libdazzle library is a companion library to GObject and Gtk+. It provides various features that we wish were in the underlying library but cannot for various reasons.
Source.Description: The libdazzle library is a companion library to GObject and Gtk+. It provides various features that we wish were in the underlying library but cannot for various reasons.
